sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Button, Container, Dimmer, Icon, Image, Item, Label, Loader, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' const paragraph = class ProductList extends React.Component { state = { loading: false, error: null, data: [] } componentDidMount() { this.setState({ loading: true }) axios.get('/some-url') .then(res => { this.setState({ data: res.data, loading: false }) }) .catch(err => { this.setState({ error: err, loading: false }) }) } render() { return ( {loading && Loading } My Neighbor Totoro IFC Cinema {paragraph} ); } } export default ProductList
